Class Powerup

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.world.Item
      • gameworld.world.Powerup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, InanimateEntity

    public class Powerup
extends Item
    "Magic" items. May have some effect on the player who uses it and/or the player it's used on. Uses a strategy pattern and a factory pattern. KTC (?)
